attributes.additional_details: Because innocent animals are suffering for people to have products such as hairspray, shampoo conditioner bath bombs etc.
attributes.background: Try to make products without using animal testing such as the Draize Test, skin irritation test etc.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for similar actions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633591

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629860

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636675
